article: Dr Spear is a doctor living in London. She decided one morning to  _  her cat away. Dr Spear thought that it was much  better  for the animal to live in the  _  .  _  she put Mimi in her car and drove more than 100 kilometres out of the city to her brother's house and left the cat with him. A month later she was shocked to  _  that Mimi was no longer  _  ! Then one night Dr Spear heard a  _  at her bedroom window. Unable to sleep she  got out of  bed and was surprised to see a thin cat looking  _  . She chased the cat away and went back to bed. Then, just as she was about to fall asleep, something landed on her bed. "It gave me a  _  fright and then I realized it was Mimi!"
